UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Design of a Helical-Stabilized, Cyclic, and Nontoxic Analogue of the Peptide Cm-p5 With Improved Antifungal Activity.
Literature.Author: Vicente FEM, Gonzalez-Garcia M, Pico ED, Moreno-Castillo E, Garay HE, Rosi PE, Jimenez AM, Campos-Delgado JA, Rivera DG, Chinea G, Pietro RCLR, Stenger S, Spellerberg B, Kubiczek D, Bodenberger N, Dietz S, Rosenau F, Paixao MW, Standker L, Otero-González AJ

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=>400µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=>400µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 24433(MIC=>400µg/ml),Candida parapsilosis ATCC 22019(MIC=>400µg/ml),Trichophyton rubrum ATCC 28189(MIC=>400µg/ml)
